attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Liam Howlett, as the creative force behind The Prodigy, is responsible for a massive contribution to modern music the world over, and particularly to the current success of the British music industry. Electronic music has for years been developing into an international phenomenon that unites people irrespective of backgrounds or beliefs. He fully deserves recognition, not least for the raised profile and popularity of the British dance music scene.
